name: Brains of Racing
description:
Back with a new GemToy™ Entry!

This time, the theme is to mix genres so I'm making a Turned-Base Strategy Racing game !

Up = accelerate

down = decelerate/go back)

left/right = turn

A = validate

B = reset

Start = Exit menu

PS: don’t push the power button, it’s gonna crash (sorry)

PC version:

A = Space / B = Ctrl / Start = Shift

Up, Down, Left, Right = Keyboard Arrows
